Not to be very judgemental… this is useless.

Common knowledge.

Sorry.

:o But we all started with coding once. We all not know what a case number was. Or how to add a Object. Right?
This is not for advance coders. But for begginer coders
[/quote]

Sorry but this is crap

  1. Everybody can find cases and add actions, If you cant do that you shouldnt be coding

  2. We all not know what a case number was - Learn English before posting on an english forum

  3. Snippet

Requested lock[/quote]

Right. Then why u reply on it? U can just report it and request for lock? Spamm post? stop reply and say someting what someone else already said.

(Still thanks for that shops that takes money It works 100%)

item.title: (317) Clicking on a skill will Message/Tele you (317)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[size=14pt]Hello and welcome to my Tutorial , How to add when you click on a skill it teles you or it give you a message.
Note : I am bad in the spelling of english.[/size]

Sourch : Delta (Didnt tested on other sourches)
type : 317
Difficult : 1/10
Files eddited : Clickingmost.Java

Lets start.

Open up your Clickingmost.java

Add this somewhere by the cases :

case 33223://Woodcutting c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); break; case 33224://Runecrafting c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); break; case 33208://Mining c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); break; case 33210://Agility c.triggerTele(2477, 3437, 0); break; case 33214://Fishing c.sM("Your message"); break; case 47130://Slayer c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33206://Attack c.sM("'Your message'"); break; case 33207://HP c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33209://Str c.sM("'Your message'"); break; case 33212://Def c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33215://Range c.sM("'Your message'"); break; case 33221://Magic c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33218://Pray c.sM("'Your message'"); break; case 33211://Smithing c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33222://fletching c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33216://thieving c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); break; case 33213://herblore c.sM("Your message"); break; case 54104://farming c.sM("'Your message'"); break; case 33220://firemaking c.sM("Your message"); break; case 33217://cooking c.sM("Your message"); break;

Some explain.

Cases : (exempel “case 33217”)
This means the skill number from your sourch. (Click on a skill and look in your run.bat from the sourch some sourches will give the number of it if you click on it)

c.sM(“Your message”); : This means the message it will send to you. Always c. or it wont work. Becaus you are not coding in client.java but in clickingmost.java.
You can also use @blu@ , @red@ or other colours. then it will be that colour
Exampel : c.sM("@red@Your message")

c.triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0); : This means where it tele you to.
xxxx = X-Coords
yyyy = Y coords
0 = How high it is

Exampel :c.triggerTele(2757, 2790, 0);

That was all. Easy huh?
(http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423150.0.html This is a tutorial from someone else that do this with Skillmenu’s)

[size=12pt]I Hope you like it! and i hope you didnt know this yet (Everone need to know this.)

Youridudock[/size]

Read full topic
